changeSet.author: pwadmore
changeSet.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('FFF_REPORTING.FME_JOB_AUDIT', 'U') IS NULL CREATE TABLE FFF_REPORTING.FME_JOB_AUDIT ( ID BIGINT IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL, JOB_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, WHERE_CLAUSE NVARCHAR(200) NOT NULL, OUTPUT_COUNT SMALLINT NULL, TIME_REQUESTED DATETIME NULL, TIME_STARTED DATETIME NULL, TIME_FINISHED DATETIME NULL, JOB_DURATION_SECONDS SMALLINT NULL, STATUS NVARCHAR(50) NULL, STATUS_MSG NVARCHAR(254) NULL CONSTRAINT PK_FME_JOB_AUDIT PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ([ID]) )

rollback.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('FFF_REPORTING.FME_JOB_AUDIT', 'U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE FFF_REPORTING.FME_JOB_AUDIT
